behavior use_remote_control(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)  # Hold the remote control temporarily
        achieve facing(remote_control, dvd_player)  # Ensure the remote is facing the DVD player
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)  # Turn on the DVD player

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control]==2052
        # Select the remote control with ID 2052

        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        # Select the DVD player

        use_remote_control(remote_control, dvd_player)  # Use the remote control to turn on the DVD 
player

def has_switch(remote_control:item):
    # Check if the remote control has a switch
    symbol has_switch=exists switch: item : has_switch(switch) and close(switch, remote_control)
    return has_switch

behavior turn_on_dvd_player(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        if not is_on(dvd_player):
            # Check if the DVD player is not already on
            if has_switch(remote_control):
                bind switch: item where:
                    has_switch(switch)
                achieve is_on(dvd_player)
            else:
                observe(remote_control, "How to turn on the DVD player with this remote")

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control] == 2052
        # Select the specific remote control with ID 2052
        
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        # Select the DVD player
        
        turn_on_dvd_player(remote_control, dvd_player)
